product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes: New River Gorge
long_description: Take your pick of the 20 short hikes featured in. Author: Johnny Molloy. Softcover; 103 pages; black-and-white maps. Morris Book Publishing; copyright 2013. Hikes range from singletrack hikes in deep forest or well-marked nature trails on interpretive paths. Trail finder offers suggestions for lake and river lovers, children, dogs, great views and history buffs. Hike descriptions include mile-by-mile markers as well as approximate time and difficulty. At 7 x 4.5 in., Best Easy Day Hikes New River Gorge is easy to store in a pocket or daypack.
short_description: Take your pick of the 20 short hikes featured in Best Easy Day Hikes New River Gorge and set out to explore West Virginia's lush landscape.
